spec_data.Name: python2-django-select2
spec_data.Description:
Django includes basic select widget, which just generates
<select><option>…</option>…</select> tags.  Although their
‘looks’ can be improved using basic CSS, but we hit a usability
problem when there are too many options to select from.
This is where Django-Select2 comes into picture.
This package provides Python 2 build of Django-Select2.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 12:37:40 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Select2 option fields for Django - Python 2 version
